content:
Hello!
I wanted to post this in case anyone might be interested in participating. Our company MayJuun will be co-hosting a Healthcare Hackathon July 9-11 along with The @ Company. We're encouraging, but not requiring, the use of Dart/Flutter (and of course FHIR). We have a lot of devs signed up, but could use some more content experts. So if you (or anyone you know) would be interested in either participating directly or as an advisor to some of the groups, please let me know!
